scheme_name: Financial Assistance/Pension to Former Renowned Sportspersons
brief_description: The scheme aims to provide monthly support of ₹4,000 to ₹10,000 for life to financially weak former athletes of the state.
detailed_description: The &quot;Financial Assistance/Pension to Former Renowned Sportspersons&quot; scheme was launched by the Directorate of Sports, Government of Uttarakhand. The scheme aims to provide lifelong monthly financial support/pension to former renowned athletes/sportspersons who brought recognition to the state through national or international competitions and are now financially weak.
benefits: A lifelong monthly pension will be provided, with amounts ranging from a minimum of ₹4,000/- to a maximum of ₹10,000/-.
eligibility_criteria:
The applicant should be a permanent resident of Uttarakhand. The applicant should be an ex-sportsperson. The applicant must be above 50 years of age. The applicant should not be currently employed. The applicant's monthly income from all private sources should not exceed ₹20,000. The applicant should be a former medalist or participant in:
Olympic Games, World Cup/Championship Asian Games, Commonwealth Games Afro-Asian Games, SAF Games Para-Olympic/Special Olympic (Mental/Physical Disabilities) World Marathon (Disabled), International Veteran (Masters) Championships

steps: The department will release the the public advertisement for the inviting applications.

Step 1: The eligible applicant should visit (during office hours) the Directorate of Sports, Uttarakhand, and request a hard copy of the prescribed format of the application form from the staff exclusively entrusted to issue and collect filled-in applications.
Step 2: In the application form, fill in all the mandatory fields and attach copies of all the mandatory documents (self-attested, if required).
Step 3: Submit the duly filled and signed application form along with the documents to the Directorate of Sports, Uttarakhand.

documents_required: Participation/Medal Certificates Permanent Residence Certificate Income Certificate Aadhaar Card Bank Account Details Birth Certificate
